嬳字的基本解释

嬳
yuè
作姿态。
惜。

嬳字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yuè］
［《廣韻》憂縛切，入藥，影。］
(1)故作姿态。
(2)怜惜。

嬳字的康熙字典解释

【丑集下】【女字部】　嬳； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页273第08
【廣韻】憂縛切【集韻】鬱縛切。?同?。作姿態也。【揚子·方言】江南謂之?，山東謂之嬳。　又【集韻】屋郭切，音彠。義同。　又胡故切，音護。惜也。

嬳字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
嬳字的起名意思

暂无。

嬳
Basic explanation of words
嬳
yuè
Make a gesture.
Pity.
嬳
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yuè］
["Guangyun" worrying and cutting, medicine, shadow. ]
(1) Pretending to be a posture.
(2) Pity.
嬳
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chou Ji 2] [Female Character Department] 　嬳; Kangxi Strokes: 17; Page Number: Page 273 08
[Guang Yun] worry bound cut [Ji Yun] depression bound cut. ?with?. Make gestures too. [Yangtze Dialect] Jiangnan is called it? Shandong is called Huan.　[Jiyun] Wu Guoqie, sound 彠. The same meaning.　 Hu Qi cut, sound protection. It's a pity.
